quotes.content: You know, I rather like this God fellow. Very theatrical, you know. Pestilence here, a plague there. Omnipotence... gotta get me some of that.
Lions eating Christians, people nailing each other to two-by-fours. I'll say, you won't find that in Winnie the Pooh.
Look, I really don't want to go to hell, but I can't stop my nature. I'm just a hateful person
Women respond when you treat them like crap

Let me guess, you picked out yet another colorful box with a crank that I'm expected to turn and turn until OOP! big shock, a jack pops out and you laugh and the kids laugh and the dog laughs and I die a little inside.
Damn you vile woman, you've impeded my work since the day I escaped your vile womb.
When the world is mine, your death shall be quick and painless.
Question me again and I will put you on diaper detail, and I promise I won't make it easy on you.
Who cares what you say, you're a dog, you can't see colors, which means you can't see the colors on the American flag, Commie.
I love God. He's so deliciously evil.
By all means, turn me into a child star. Perhaps I can move to Californ-i-ay and wrangle me a three-way with the Olsen twins.
Hello, mother. I come bearing a gift. I’ll give you a hint. It’s in my diaper and it’s not a toaster.
Am I to spend the entire day wallowing around in my own feces? A little service here!
You know, mother, this could almost have passed for a palatable banana pudding, but without Nilla wafers it’s just another one of your wretched culinary abortions. Now clean it up!
Oh I feel so delightfully white trash. Mommy, I want a mullet.
Forecast for tomorrow; a few sprinkles of genius with a chance of doom!
Every hot girl who can aim a camera thinks she's a photographer. Ooh, you took a black and white picture of a lawn chair and its shadow. You must be so brooding and deep.
Come, ice cream. Come to my mouth. How dare you disobey me!
Did you hear that Meg? Guys can marry other guys now. So...this is awkward, but I mean, if they can do that, that is pretty much it for you, isn't it? I mean you as well pack it in. Game over.

Did you call that engineer at Lockheed yet? Well of course you didn't you worthless little (thwack!)... There, see what you made me do? Do you think I enjoy hitting you? Well actually I do. I enjoy it so much I'm going to do it again!
You know mother, as first lady of the american stage Helen Hayes once said, I'M GOING TO KILL YOU!
